div.div: Delta Lake Lineage Essentials in Databricks Unity Catalog

div.style: font-family: Newsreader, serif; font-size: 70px; font-weight: 400; word-wrap: break-word;

div.div: As teams build data products on Databricks Unity Catalog (UC), one question always comes up: “How do we track which tables feed into which outputs?” …
